Title: Establishes a gang prevention coordination council
Summary: Establishes a gang prevention coordination council to evaluate the needs and strengths of local governments in each county of the state relating to juvenile delinquency, gang activity, and gang violence and prevention, award grants to local government agencies and not-for-profit corporations; publish guidelines for local governments to implement evidence-based practices to prevent gang activity and prevent youth from joining gangs; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a gang prevention coordination council
